titles.title: When War Is Hot And Fierce (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When war is hot and fierce And Satan strong Then firmly trust God's Word And sing faith's song{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You need to shout but once And you will win Oh do not shut your mouth And lose therin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If pressed your spirit is And powerless Pray thru the precious blood Victorious{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The foe though fierce you can Still fight with him If you will keep your stand You soon will win{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Therefore you must declare Christ's victory The situation dark Soon changed will be{/lang-eng}
